-- =============================================================================
-- General Scripts
-- Azure Synapse Analytics Demo
-- https://github.com/aessing/demo-azuresynapse
-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- Developer.......: Andre Essing (https://www.andre-essing.de/)
--                                (https://github.com/aessing)
--                                (https://twitter.com/aessing)
--                                (https://www.linkedin.com/in/aessing/)
-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- THIS CODE AND INFORMATION ARE PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND,
-- EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE IMPLIED
-- WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND/OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.
-- =============================================================================

-- This script will configure the SQL Pool created for the demos with some
-- settings that are best practice and make it the database behave as expected

-- #############################################################################
-- DON'T FORGET TO CHOOSE THE CORRECT SQL POOL AND DATABASE
-- #############################################################################

-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- Configure settings in the SQL Pool
-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- RUN IN MASTER DATABASE
ALTER DATABASE [DEMOPOOL01] SET READ_COMMITTED_SNAPSHOT OFF
ALTER DATABASE [DEMOPOOL01] SET RESULT_SET_CACHING ON
ALTER DATABASE [DEMOPOOL01] SET ENCRYPTION ON
GO

-- RUN IN USER DATABASE
ALTER DATABASE [DEMOPOOL01] SET AUTO_CREATE_STATISTICS ON
ALTER DATABASE [DEMOPOOL01] SET QUERY_STORE = ON
GO

-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- Allow Purview to index data that are stored in the SQL Pool
-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- RUN IN USER DATABASE
CREATE USER [demosynapsepvw01] FROM EXTERNAL PROVIDER
EXEC sp_addrolemember 'db_datareader', 'demosynapsepvw01'
GO
